Desc.entry: Run by Dimensions a not-for-profit company. Has two 6-bedroomed bungalows for people with learning disabilities. The bungalows are adjacent to each other on Gleadless Common and Gleadless View. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
